overview: Dennis Hwang, or Hwang Jeong-mok is a graphic artist who designs the festive logos for Google on special days. He designed his first logo for Google in honor of Bastille Day, July 14, 2000, at the request of Larry Page and Sergey Brin, and has been designing the specialty logos ever since. Other logos have been designed commemorating Thanksgiving, Christmas, and unusual events such as Piet Mondrian’s birthday.

video_embeds.description: Chief Google Doodler Dennis Hwang draw a Google Doodle from start to finish.
